author: Special Correspondent
text: An 18-year-old girl was found dead in a well at Kottaiyur village near Thuraiyur on Sunday. The victim, identified as M. Mohanambal, was studying Plus Two in Government Higher Secondary School at Thuraiyur. According to police, the local people found the girl’s body floating inside the well. The girl’s parents said that she had accidentally fallen into the well while plucking coriander leaves. Investigation is on. – Special Correspondent
title: Girl found dead in well
